question: 3|Which countries in Latin America had above-average social support and also experienced below-average negative affect in 2020?
query: SELECT   country_name FROM world_happiness_report WHERE   regional_indicator = 'Latin America and Caribbean'   AND year = 2020   AND social_support > (     SELECT       AVG(social_support)     FROM world_happiness_report     WHERE       year = 2020   )   AND negative_affect < (     SELECT       AVG(negative_affect)     FROM world_happiness_report     WHERE       year = 2020   ) LIMIT 50;
answer: In 2020, Jamaica, Paraguay, and Uruguay were the Latin American countries that reported above-average social support and also experienced below-average negative affect.
